extendedInfo.description: If you are Cheryl Cole's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Cheryl Cole's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Cheryl Cole's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Cheryl Cole's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - 3 Words- Messy Little Raindrops- A Million Lights-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - 3 Words- A Million Lights- All Is Fair- Amnesia- Better To Lie- Boy Like You- Boys- Boys Lie- Call My Name- Craziest Things- Don't Talk About This Love- Dum Dum- Everyone- Fight For This Love- Ghetto Baby- Girl In The Mirror- Happy Hour- Happy Tears- Heartbreaker- Heaven- Hummingbird- I Like It- Last One Standing- Let's Get Down- Live Tonight- Love Killer- Make Me Cry- Make You Go- Mechanics Of The Heart- Need You Now- One Thousand- Parachute- Promise This- Rain On Me- Raindrops- Screw You- Sexy Den A Mutha- Stand Up- Teddy Bear- Telescope- The Flood- Under The Sun- Waiting- Yeah Yeah
